objects.name: Analytic 0069
objects.description: Detects unauthorized access, copying, or modification of Kerberos ccache files (krb5cc_%UID% or krb5.ccache) in /tmp or custom paths defined by KRB5CCNAME. Correlates file access with suspicious processes (e.g., credential dumping tools) and subsequent anomalous Kerberos authentication requests from non-standard processes.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: open: File access attempt on /tmp/krb5cc_* or /tmp/krb5.ccache

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of klist, kinit, or tools interacting with ccache outside normal user context

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Expected directories or environment variable (KRB5CCNAME) paths for ccache files in the environment.
Baseline list of processes legitimately interacting with ccache (e.g., klist, kinit).
Correlation window for linking file access, process execution, and Kerberos requests.
